description:
This course is designed for those who are looking to take their leadership skills to the next level. Maybe you have recently got a promotion and have been tasked with leading a team, maybe you have been doing this for years or maybe you are hoping to move up and take more responsibility in your career. Whatever your situation this leadership course has been designed to give you the tools to critically evaluate your own practices and improve them with real world techniques and examples.

The course is taught by one of our most experienced instructors, Monty Mountford OBE. Monty has over 30 years experience of leadership and management in complex and dynamic environments. He is a former Officer in the British Army and has led teams of 1500 people. He also has attended and graduated form some of the world's leading management and leadership institutes. He has a relaxed but extremely efficient teaching style which gets the message across quickly and with maximum impact. We guarantee you will enjoy this course and your leadership skills will jump to the next level.
title: How to Become a Better Leader
